item.name: Device contact details
item.description: SNMPv2-MIB::sysContact.0 - The textual identification of the contact person for this managed node, together with information on how to contact this person. If no contact information is known, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: Device description
item.description: SNMPv2-MIB::sysDescr.0 - A textual description of the entity. This value should include the full name and version identification of the system's hardware type, software operating-system, and networking software.

item.name: Device location
item.description: SNMPv2-MIB::sysLocation.0 - The physical location of this node (e.g., `telephone closet, 3rd floor'). If the location is unknown, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: Device name
item.description: SNMPv2-MIB::sysName.0 - An administratively-assigned name for this managed node. By convention, this is the node's fully-qualified domain name. If the name is unknown, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: SysUptime
item.description: DISMAN-EVENT-MIB::sysUpTimeInstance - Uptime of the system in TimeTicks (100 timeticks == 1 second)

discovery_rule.name: Discover ALE OmniSwitch AOS Release 6.x
discovery_rule.description: ALCATEL-IND1-PORT-MIB::esmSlotNumber.X - X is the slot number (element of the stack)

discovery_rule.name: Discover ALE OmniSwitch Entity AOS Release 6.x
discovery_rule.description: ENTITY-MIB::entPhysicalContainedIn.X - X is the slot number (element of the stack) and VALUE is Entity-value

trigger.name: {HOSTNAME} has been restarted
trigger.description: In Alcatel-Lucent Enterprise OmniSwitch 1 second == 100 timeticks
